en.pageTitle: Macaroni Emoji 🍝 Copy and Paste - LaughingEmoji.net
en.metaDescription: Copy and paste beautiful macaroni and pasta emojis 🍝🍜🍲 from the largest collection of food emoticons. One-click copy for all your pasta expressions!
en.ogTitle: Macaroni Emoji 🍝 Copy and Paste - LaughingEmoji.net
en.ogDescription: The ultimate collection of macaroni emojis! Copy and paste 🍝🍜🍲 and more delicious food emojis with one click.
en.exploreDescription: Explore and copy a diverse collection of macaroni emojis for your messages and social media.
en.meaningText: The 🍝 (spaghetti) emoji depicts a plate of spaghetti noodles with a fork. It is most commonly used to represent spaghetti, pasta, Italy, or Italian food. In some contexts, it can also be used as slang for 'noods,' which is a playful reference to 'nudes.'
en.usageText: The 🍝 emoji is widely used to talk about pasta and Italian cuisine. It's often paired with other emojis like 🍕 (pizza) and the Italian flag 🇮🇹 to refer to Italy. On October 17 and 25, it is used with hashtags like #NationalPastaDay and #WorldPastaDay to celebrate these holidays. It can also be combined with 🤌 to express that the food is delicious.
en.historyText: The Spaghetti emoji 🍝 was approved under Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and was added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.
en.storyText: The word 'macaroni' in the famous song 'Yankee Doodle' was used to mock an 18th-century English dandy who had adopted an exaggerated Italian style. This is an amusing historical context for the term. There are also funny stories on the internet about people misinterpreting emoji combinations like 🤌🍝.
en.footerDescription: Your ultimate resource for macaroni emojis. Discover, copy, and share the perfect food emoticon for any occasion.

zh.mainTitle: 通心粉表情符号 🍝 复制粘贴 🍜
zh.exploreDescription: 探索并复制各种通心粉表情符号，用于您的消息和社交媒体。
zh.meaningTitle: 通心粉表情符号的含义
zh.meaningText: 🍝（意大利面）表情符号描绘了一盘带有叉子的意大利面。它最常用于表示意大利面、意大利或意大利菜肴。在某些语境下，它也可以用作俚语“noods”（面条），这是对“nudes”（裸照）的一种有趣而隐晦的称呼。
zh.usageText: 🍝表情符号被广泛用于讨论意大利面和意大利菜。它经常与🍕（披萨）和意大利国旗🇮🇹等其他表情符号搭配使用来指代意大利。在10月17日和25日，它会与#NationalPastaDay和#WorldPastaDay等标签一起使用，以庆祝这些节日。 它还可以和🤌搭配，表示食物很美味。
zh.historyText: 意大利面表情符号🍝于2010年作为Unicode 6.0的一部分被批准，并于2015年添加到Emoji 1.0中。
zh.storyText: 在著名的歌曲《扬基歌》（Yankee Doodle）中，“macaroni”（通心粉）一词被用来嘲笑18世纪采用夸张意大利风格的英国花花公子。这是这个词背后一个有趣的历史背景。 互联网上也有很多关于人们误解🤌🍝等表情符号组合的含义的有趣故事。
zh.footerDescription: 您获取通心粉表情符号的终极资源。发现、复制和分享适合任何场合的完美食物表情符号。
